content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Updated)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generation system at x=-25.0 y=80.5
(No changes from previous report)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at x=-20.5 y=69.5 (connection issues)
- Boiler at x=-25.0 y=80.5 (fuel: 22 coal)
- Steam engine at x=-25.5 y=89.5 (reappeared but not connected)
- Pipe networks with connection issues

### New electricity generation attempt at x=-6.0 y=-0.5
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at x=-9.5 y=-2.5 (new placement)
- Boiler at x=-6.0 y=-0.5 (fuel: 20 coal)
- Missing steam engine (placement failed)
- Partial pipe connections (water connection incomplete)

### Copper mining operation at x=-55.5 y=70.5
(No changes from previous report)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at x=-55.5 y=70.5 (no power)
- Burner inserter at x=-55.5 y=72.5 (fuel: 9 coal)
- Stone furnace at x=-55.0 y=75.0 (fuel: 10 coal)
- Wooden chest at x=-55.5 y=76.5 (empty)

### Iron mining operation at x=15.5 y=70.5
(No changes from previous report)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at x=15.5 y=70.5 (no power)
- Stone furnace at x=16.0 y=74.0 (no ingredients)
- Burner inserter at x=15.5 y=72.5 (working)
- Wooden chest at x=15.5 y=75.5 (empty)

## ERROR TIPS

### Entity placement verification
- Check position availability before placing (multiple steam engine placement failures due to occupied tiles)
- Verify inventory before placement (offshore pump placement failed due to missing item)
- Implement proper error handling for get_entity calls (multiple pipe verification failures)

### Power system construction
- Ensure proper spacing for steam engine placement (multiple placement attempts failed due to terrain/objects)
- Complete fluid connections before placing dependent components (boiler placed but water connection incomplete)
- Verify placement validity near water (steam engine placement failed due to water interference)

### System verification
- Implement comprehensive pre-placement checks (multiple placement attempts failed consecutively)
- Verify entity connections after placement (offshore pump shows "no fluid present" warning)
- Monitor fuel levels (boiler at x=-6.0 y=-0.5 now at 20 coal)

### Inventory management
- Track item consumption during construction (pipe count decreased from 500 to 499)
- Verify item availability before placement operations (offshore pump placement failed due to inventory check)
- Implement inventory monitoring for critical components (steam engines remaining: 2)
